
# Books

```{r}
bind_rows(
  tibble(
    date_added = "2022-03-30", 
    behind_paywall = "partial",
    title = "Refactoring Guru",
    description = "many elegant and beautiful descriptions of programming concepts",
    link = "https://refactoring.guru/",
    type = "website & book",
    author = "Alexander Shvets"
  )
) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
